channel.title: Comments on:
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description:
I'm not signed on to yahoo messenger a lot, but add me anyway (abugg78@yahoo.com)...maybe we'll run into each other!
Also, is there anything you need or want from this side of the world?
item.content:encoded:
I’m not signed on to yahoo messenger a lot, but add me anyway (abugg78@yahoo.com)…maybe we’ll run into each other!

Also, is there anything you need or want from this side of the world?
